column1: pastor jerry l. sudduth. born: | pastor jerry l. sudduth. born: december 23
column7: at osu wexner medical center in columbus

column21: and many others. jerry was also a loyal alabama crimson tide fan (roll tide roll!!!). a memorial service celebrating his life will be held at 11:00 am on june 20
column25: oh. friends may visit from 10:00 am until time of service. pastor ron dalton officiating. private family interment will be held at concord cemetery at a later date. contributions may be made in jerrys memory to the james cancer hospital
